name: Number Puzzle (Boring Games Studio)
description:
Number Puzzle is a game where you have to use numbers and the hints given to you, to figure out how to solve the puzzle.

Hint:

Magic number between 0 and 15. Three grids: 1, 2, 3. Nine cells in a grid. Select the right cell in one before moving to the next.

Goal: Select the right cells in each grid before hitting submit.

This game was made for the Unity One Script Challenge game jam.

The sound fx used are free assets from the Unity Asset Store. Here's the link: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
